Doncaster’s 6 Household Waste Recycling Centres (HWRCs) will have extended opening hours from tomorrow (Sat 13th March). 

This means all sites will now remain open until 7pm, providing residents with more opportunity to dispose of their waste.

More info: https://t.co/y2cp0DVyA7 https://t.co/ZviiCiHaTi

urls.title: Household Waste Recycling Centres (HWRCs) - Doncaster Council
urls.description: The HWRCs are for the use by Doncaster residents ONLY to dispose of their own household waste. ALL sites are open until 7pm. Please ensure you arrive no later than 6.30pm as all vehicles MUST be off site by 7pm. There could be times when a site may have to close the gates early depending on how many cars are queueing on site.

urls.title: Lessons from Fukushima disaster 10 years later | Stanford News
urls.description: A decade after a powerful earthquake and tsunami set off the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear meltdown in Japan, Stanford experts discuss revelations about radiation from the disaster, advances in earthquake science related to the event and how its devastating impact has influenced strategies for tsunami defense and local warning systems.

tweets.text: @BrynleyHeaven @East_Riding @PensanaRE @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @rwm_gdf_uk @hedontown01 The similar Teesside Peak Resources plant (that was given permission) applied to Redcar and Cleveland considering EIA was mandatory https://t.co/nOfvF81vvX

The @EnvAgency leadership team has a total of nine women. Today I’m celebrating our female Board members & executive directors, for all the work they do across the country to create better places for people and wildlife. #ActOnTheGap #TogetherForOurPlanet #ChooseToChallenge https://t.co/TjORbh0E2z

@BrynleyHeaven @East_Riding @PensanaRE @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @rwm_gdf_uk @hedontown01 But I pity the poor Council officer who is bounced to make a complicated decision on this without expert support in three days and only relying on an abbreviated statement of the process and what it entails.
@syonist @East_Riding @PensanaRE @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @rwm_gdf_uk in any case, a distinct plant within a business park/industrial estate @hedontown01

@Feargal_Sharkey @JohnIceAgency The @EnvAgency does nothing & accepts the excuse that it rained! This rare occurrence in the UK caused facilities to overflow. The wastewater industry is dishonest & badly managed. Renationalise the lot!

@BrynleyHeaven @East_Riding @PensanaRE @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @rwm_gdf_uk The request for EIA screening opinion did say it was a Schedule 2 4(k) process "Installations for the roasting and sintering of metallic ores" with floorspace >1000m2. But as it was already in Saltend that made a difference ? 

 What has that to do with price of fish ? https://t.co/IhdoV2yvzr

@syonist @East_Riding @PensanaRE @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @rwm_gdf_uk bang to rights, this a "secondary raw material", it strikes me there are two immediate concerns 1) How did East Riding come to the apparently perverse decision that an environmental assessment is not required? 2) Who is the regulating authority for toxic waste in a freeport?

tweets.text:
Attention #Anglers🚨

The close season for coarse fishing gets underway on Monday.

This means no coarse fishing on rivers and streams for three months. We do this to give fish a chance to breed🐟

If you see someone breaking this please report it to 0800 807060⚠️ #Fishing https://t.co/sDNnPigRZw
